long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Ctiny, you can shorten, brand, re-target and get deeper insights on how your link performs. You can re-target any audience accessing any website by just creating a link using Ctiny.

 With the Ctiny Chrome extension, you can create branded short links directly from the page you are visiting. You can easily add tags, redirect based on device, protect your link with passwords, expire your link, add re-targeting pixels, perform A/B testing, Split request by weight (percentage) and more.

Ctiny also has integrations with Zapier using which you can easily manage your workflow.
